<title level="1" right="Rules">[Additional Lore 1st](/Rules.aspx?ID=1473)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 63

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 1st level in a branch, you learn more of the Magaambya's deep well of lore associated with your branch. You gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=750) feat in a Lore skill associated with the branch.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
